description:
Get up-to-date training in goal setting, job search techniques, cover letter design and preparation, resume design, & interview techniques for effective communication and representation and tips on preparing the best proposals and presentations with the Professional Development Foundation Complete Certification Kit.

Are you looking to get hired for your next job and would benefit from Professional Development support with:

1. How to format and update your Resume to highlight your skills and experience?

2. How to make your job application stand out from the crowd and grab an employers' attention?

3. How to prepare interview questions?

4. How to answer questions about skills and experience?

5. How to sell yourself in a job interview?

This Professional Development Foundation Certification Kit will address the basics of Professional Development in a clear and convenient way.

The focus of this program is to aid in your preparation and practice during your job search. Giving you the knowledge that you need to ensure success and build on the foundation to succeed and achieve your goals.

title: Professional Development Foundation
